caption.p: Cycling trends with Coulombic efficiency (right y-axis) related to (a) Li/DEGDME_HCE/S:Sn 80:20 and (b) Li/TREGDME_HCE/LFP cells galvanostatically cycled at 1C (1675 mA g S –1) and C/3 (1C = 170 mA g –1), respectively. The Li/S cell was cycled at 35 °C by exploiting an electrolyte/sulfur ratio of 20 μL mg –1 and a 1.6–2.8 V voltage range. The Li/LFP cell was cycled at room temperature (25 °C) by employing a 1.2–3.9 V voltage range for the first cycle and voltage limits of 2.7 and 3.9 V for the subsequent ones.
